title: AirPort
summary: AirPort is the name given to a series of products by Apple Inc. using the Wi-Fi protocols (802.11b, 802.11g, 802.11n and 802.11ac). These products comprise a number of wireless routers and wireless cards. In Japan, the line of products was marketed under the brand AirMac[1] due to previous registration by I-O Data.[2]
